The '''2008 Carolina Panthers season''' is the franchise's 14th season. They entered the season and improved on their 7-9 record from [[2007 Carolina Panthers season|2007]], clinching a playoff berth in the process, when the Ravens shut down the [[Dallas Cowboys]] at [[Texas Stadium]]. Their 12-4 finish tied their best in franchise history, which occurred in the [[1996 Carolina Panthers season|1996 season]].
